Projects.title: Blog Deraslife
desc: Deraslife adalah sebuah platform yang menghadirkan kabar terbaru seputar hiburan, destinasi wisata, dan topik hangat dari seluruh dunia. Kami tidak hanya menyajikan informasi, tapi juga menjadi teman perjalanan dalam menemukan hiburan yang sesuai dengan minatmu.

Web ini memiliki beberapa fitur, seperti dasbor untuk pengguna melihat traffik web dan pembaca artikel, fitur pencarian artikel, dan juga fitur kategori artikel. Web ini juga memiliki desain yang responsif, sehingga dapat diakses dengan baik di berbagai perangkat, mulai dari desktop hingga ponsel.
Deraslife fokus pada topik-topik yang sedang hangat diperbincangkan di indonesia. dengan tujuan untuk memberikan informasi yang relevan dan menarik bagi pembaca kami.

Projects.title: Rujukan Santri
desc: Website Rujukan Santri yang terintegrasi dengan google drive menyajikan beragam kitab-kitab turats di berbagai bidang keilmuan seperti fiqh, ushul fiqh hingga ilmu tauhid. Dengan website ini, santri dapat menulis artikel sembari berbagi ilmu dengan tidak hanya menyajikan materi etapi juga sumber-sumber secara digital.

Website ini juga memiliki beberapa fitur seperti dashboard untuk menulis, memantau traffic,terhubung dengan Google Analytic dan SEO Search Engine Optimization, terlebih lagi dapat menganalisa perkembangan an mengevaluasi tulisan gar kedepannya mampu untuk menyajikan konten artikel yang lebih baik. Website ini juga memiliki fitur pencarian, filter artikel berdasarkan kategori hingga sitemap untuk SEO.

Projects.title: SDN 6 Payabakong
desc: Website SDN 6 Payabakong adalah salah satu website yang dibangun untuk memperkenalkan Sekolah Dasar Negeri 6 Payabakong, dengan tampilan home page yang menampilkan Visi & Misi Sekolah secara singkat lalu memberikan sedikit biodata.

Website SDN 6 Payabakong mempunyai beberapa fitur utama, seperti halaman untuk menulis artikel mengenai kegiatan dan acara sekolah, lalu halaman galeri yang berisi video dan foto kenangan sekolah tersebut, tidak lupa halaman lain seperti, struktur organisasi sekolah, data guru dan siswa, hingga beragam informasi menenai fasilitas ekstrakulikuler SDN 6.

Projects.title: Rolex Invest
desc: Ini adalah web yang saya buat untuk melatih kemampuan saya dalam membuat web. Web ini dibuat menggunakan HTML, CSS, dan JavaScript.

Di website ini saya membuat halaman frotend nya saja, tidak ada backend. berisi halaman utama yang menampilkan deskripsi, foto slide, dan artikel. lalu ada halaman list jam, halaman tugas, hingga halaman akun sederhana.

Projects.title: Generative Trivia
desc: A generative trivia website built with Next.js, Firebase, NextAuth, Google OAuth, and TypeScript. Users can generate trivia questions for predefined school subjects and answer them with a unique interactive input style. The application supports user authentication with Google and stores data in Firestore.

The project is a culmination of my passion for web development and my desire to create a fun and interactive learning platform. The website is designed to be user-friendly and engaging, with a clean and modern interface that appeals to a wide audience. The trivia questions are generated using the Gemini API, which provides a diverse range of questions for users to answer.

Projects.title: Saku Senyum
desc: Saku Senyum is a website that I created as a Fullstack Developer in PT Hafdzahmedia based on client request. The website is a sales management for UMKM or small business. The website is built using Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ShadCN UI, Prisma, and MySQL.

The website has a few features such as a dashboard for the user to manage their business sales, a statistic page, and a sales report page. User can see their sales performance in a fancy chart to make it easier to understand. The user also can export their sales report to a PDF file which can be printed or saved to their device.

Projects.title: Simadun
desc: Simadun is an Exam Management System developed for doctoral students in the Department of Electrical Engineering and Informatics Universitas Negeri Malang. The system facilitates the management of five different types of examinations, allowing students to apply for exams with ease. Professors and program heads can efficiently oversee the exam processes.

With Simadun, students can submit their exam applications online, track their application status, and receive timely notifications regarding their exam schedules. Program heads and relevant lecturers have access to comprehensive dashboards where they can manage exam requests, allocate resources, and monitor overall exam logistics.

Projects.title: LUDOang
desc: LUDOang is a game that my team and I created for a final project in my university. The game is built python, pygame, and OpenGL. The game is a 2D game that is inspired by a Ludo game. The game has a few features such randomZone, and a 3D dice.

RandomZone is a feature that allows the player to get a random number of steps. The 3D dice is a feature that allows the player to roll a 3D dice. The game also has a few other features menuy screen and also loading screen.
Beside that the game also has a audio theme that will play when the game is started. The game also has a few sound effects such as dice roll sound, and a sound when the player win the game.

Projects.title: VICC Landing Page
desc: This project is one of my freelance projects. This project is a landing page for Vocational Inter-cultural Camp event held by Vocational Faculty of Universitas Negeri Malang. The website is built using Next.js, Javascript, and Tailwind CSS.

The website is mainly frontend project, which is already using responsive design. The website has a few features such carousel, and a few animations. The website also has a few pages such as home, topic, and speaker page.

Projects.title: React Realtime Chat
desc: My ambitious project that delves into the world of interactive web development using React. This project is a realtime chat application that allows users to create chat rooms and chat with other users in realtime. The application is built using React, Firebase, and Daisy UI.

This project is my second react project and my first project using Firebase. I learned a lot about how to use Firebase and how to use React to create a realtime application. I also learned how to use Daisy UI, a CSS framework that is built on top of Tailwind CSS.

Projects.title: React Tools
desc: React Tools is a groundbreaking and user-friendly project that brings together a comprehensive collection of tools and components crafted with cutting-edge technologies, including React, React Router, and TailwindCSS. What sets this project apart is that it's not just a suite of powerful features, but it's also a significant milestone as it marks my very first venture into the world of React development.

Unlike traditional web applications, React Tools cleverly utilizes browser local storage, eliminating the need for external databases. This not only ensures seamless performance but also prioritizes user data privacy.

The Todo List keeps tasks in check with intuitive task management capabilities, ensuring you never miss a beat. The note-taking feature provides a hassle-free way to jot down ideas and crucial information, accessible whenever inspiration strikes. Additionally, our robust expense tracker simplifies financial management by recording and categorizing expenses, delivering insightful spending analysis.

Projects.title: Aleph Discord Bot
desc: Aleph is a Discord bot that I created for my dircord server to use. The bot is built using Python and the discord.py library. The bot has image grabber feauture that takes argument (keywords) and returns an image from the internet.

Other than that this bot has a few other features such as utility command to delete a messages, and a command to get the server's ping. This bot is still in development and I plan to add more features in the future.

Projects.title: LPTK Cup 2023 Website
desc: LPTK Cup UM is a website that I created for a competition held by  the Universitas Negeri Malang. The website is mainly built using Laravel and Bootstrap. The website has a few features such as a registration form, a login system, article system, file upload,  and a dashboard for the admin to manage the contents.

This project is my second freelance project, this project is not as big as my first freelance project but I learned a lot from this project. I learn how to manage a project and how to work with a team.

Projects.title: NU INO Website
desc: My first freelance project. This project is a website for a School based on a JALAKAR curriculum. The website is built mainly using Laravel and Bootstrap.
This website is LMS like system, have a user management, user auth, quiz and material for student and FAQ
In this project I learned how to work with a team and how to manage a project. I also learned new library such as livewire and alpine.js.

Projects.title: Personal Protfolio Website
desc: A personal portfolio website that I created for a client. The website is built using two main tech, native (HTML, CSSS, JS) and react based (ReactJs, TailwindCSS, Typescript). The website also created based on the client design, and improved and sliced by me. The website has a few features such as a about page, a project page, resume page, and a contact page.

The website is created using a modern design and a clean interface that appeals to a wide audience. The website also has a responsive design that makes it easy to use on any device. The website also has a few animations that make the website more interactive and engaging.
